# Empower Automation

Custom Google Workspace Automation Specialist. We build bespoke Google Apps Scripts to streamline your business, save time, and eliminate manual admin.

## Services

- **Google Workspace Automation**: Custom scripts for Gmail, Sheets, Docs, and Drive.
- **Web Data Extraction**: Automated scraping for market research and lead gen.
- **Business Process Automation**: End-to-end workflow optimization.
- **Consulting**: Strategic automation advice for small businesses.

## Pricing

- **The Essentials**: £150 - £250 (Quick wins like Gmail Archivers)
- **Business Ops**: £450 - £750 (Full workflow automation)
- **AI Agents**: £950 - £2,000+ (Intelligent autonomous agents)

## Contact
- Email: nicola@empowerautomation.co.uk
- Website: https://empowerautomation.co.uk
